blog.name: whatisthepointofyouhardy
blog.title: Run for your Life
blog.description: Ania. 23. Poland. THIS BLOG IS CURRENTLY A MICHAEL SHEEN MESS. I’m sorry. Tennant is my hero, I ship DTxGT because they are adorable, The Doctor x Rose, Lucifer x Chloe, I love Alec Hardy with my whole heart and still am not okay that Hardy x Miller didn’t happen, I read too much fanfics and still have a soft spot for Downey Jr. Hello!

question: Some Michael Sheen film/show recs?
answer:
Ok it’s the 4th time I try to respond to this thing. BUT YES OF COURSE. I’m not an expert but my favs are:

1. First of all Billiam Masters owns my ass, so you should probably watch Masters of Sex

2. He is amazing as Brian Clough in The Damned United

3. FANTASTIC as Kenneth Williams in Fantabulosa

4. Adorable as Colin in Heartlands

5. Beautiful Boy broke my heart

6. Dirty Filthy Love should be seen for sure 

7. He was in 4 episodes of 30 Rocks and it’s definitely worth seeing 

8. Good Omens but that’s quite obvious, right?

@thedeliriumtennants that is the expert here and my Sheen guru says a Sheen starter pack is:

1. Masters of Sex
2. The Damned United 
3. Heartlands
4. Fantabulosa
5. Unthinkable
6. Frost/Nixon

You should listen to her. 

ASK ME QUESTIONS

body:
A Fact

Crowley’s walking looks Like That especially in more “modern” times because he never actually recovered from walking on consecrated ground but he doesn’t want to make Aziraphale worry. No, I will not accept any criticism, thank you.

summary: I was looking back at the Good Omens post on my page. I remeber how happy I was a when they announced Michael and David as the...
body:
I was looking back at the Good Omens post on my page. I remeber how happy I was a when they announced Michael and David as the main cast for the serie (at time I knew David for Doctor Who mainly), but really my happiness was all on the “finally finally we get a Good Omens adaptation!!”. I didn’t take really notice of the actors.

Bad bad me. The serie is great but this is because how much love they put in their characters and how immeasurable well they played them.

Crowley and Aziraphale came to life because of them.

So David and Michael thank you! I love both of you and I owe you one of the best time of my life

summary: “...and I think he just sort of falls in love with Crowley over the hundreds of years, the millenia they spend together and so...
body:
“…and I think he just sort of falls in love with Crowley over the hundreds of years, the millenia they spend together and so that helps cause David is very easy to fall in love with, so I spent most of my time gazing at him, lovingly.”

- had to type that out for myself

blog.name: bluestaratsunrise
blog.title: BlueStarAtSunrise
blog.description:
Angbang/Melron Discord: https://discord.gg/6Ezc22P

Nature & animal lover. I post about issues I care about (Chronic Illness, GLBTQ & Disability rights, among many others), and lots of fandom stuff. Part of Loki’s Army

Fan of: Doctor Who, Good Omens, The Silmarillion, Tolkien's Legendarium, LOTR, AHS Murder House & Apocalypse , Star Wars, Star Trek, The Marvel Universe, Game Of Thrones, Harry Potter, The Fantastical Beasts Series, The Hunger Games, Twin Peaks, Westworld, OUAT (seasons 1-3A.) I tend to sympathize/empathize with villains/anti-heros/antagonists with complex characteristics & tragic backstories (doesn’t mean I condone all of their actions). If this is a problem for you, you probably shouldn’t follow me. FYI, I do sometimes post smut. Bi, disabled, cis female Tolkien Ship Names: https://bluestaratsunrise.tumblr.com/post/179517011918/tolkien-fandom-ship-names

My favorite ships are: Angbang/Melron, Russingon, Gigolas, BagginsShield, Rumbelle, Grindeldore, Bellamort, Harry/Ginny, Ron/Hermione, some versions of Silvergifting, and both Loki and Michael Langdon with many characters. Fan of: Robert Carlyle, Tom Hiddleston (Hiddlestoner), Cody Fern, Chris Hemsworth, Idris Alba, RDJ, Chris Evans, Brie Larson, Jason Isaacs, Sebastian Stan, Jason Mamoa.

If you try to bully me or my friends, I won’t put up with it. I will call you out and publicly mess with you. Haters will drop kicked. If you’re a bully type, you’re better off not engaging me. Avatar art by melkorts4; Header image art by artano-al & public domain pictures

summary: Started watching Good Omens and I have to say I love it! I only wish that they hadn’t had the world only be about 6000 years...
body: Started watching Good Omens and I have to say I love it! I only wish that they hadn’t had the world only be about 6000 years old, basically confirming young earth creationism and throwing out verifiable science. Other than that it’s great! Crowley is of course my favorite character (David Tennant has been a favorite of mine since Doctor Who). If I ever have kids, I want Crowley to be their nanny 😁
